Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at McCarren Hotel & Pool places you in the heart of Brooklyn, convenient to Williamsburg Bridge and New York University. This 4-star hotel is close to Brooklyn Bridge and Chrysler Building.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 64 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and 42-inch flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Williamsburg Bridge - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Gantry Plaza State Park - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
MoMA PS1 - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
5 Pointz The Institute of Higher Burnin - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
The Orpheum Theater - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
P.S.1 Contemporary Art Center - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Lower East Side Tenement Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Peter Cooper Park - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
SculptureCenter - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Gramercy Park - 3.2 km / 2 mi
New Museum - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Merchant's House Museum - 3.2 km / 2 mi
St. Ann's Warehouse - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Eldridge Street Synagogue - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Mott Street - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 5 km / 3.1 mi
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 16.9 km / 10.5 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 19 km / 11.8 mi

The preferred airport for McCarren Hotel & Pool is New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
